name: Millennial Park: Sadness, Scratching, Senescence - an exploration of struggle in the modern world through a pop-art lens
name_original: Millennial Park: Sadness, Scratching, Senescence - an exploration of struggle in the modern world through a pop-art lens
description:
You just want to play but all these humans have problems or whatever. Maybe you can bring them something to cheer them up?

Controls - WASD + mouse look. E to pick up items
